trans-unit.source: Customizes SOAP generation and processing for a method.
trans-unit.target: 自定义 SOAP 生成和处理的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The target objects for the SoapMethodAttribute attribute are methods that can be remotely invoked.
trans-unit.target: SoapMethodAttribute 属性的目标对象是可远程调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Apply the SoapMethodAttribute to customize SOAP generation and processing.
trans-unit.target: 应用 SoapMethodAttribute 自定义 SOAP 生成和处理。

trans-unit.source: Properties of this attribute allow the programmer to customize the SOAPAction HTTP header field to indicate the intent of the SOAP HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的属性允许程序员也要自定义的 SOAPAction HTTP 标头字段，以指示 SOAP HTTP 请求的意图。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML element name to use for the method response to the target method.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于对目标方法的方法响应的 XML 元素名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is the string "Response" appended to the name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是"响应"追加到方法的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The XML element name to use for the method response to the target method.
trans-unit.target: 要用于对目标方法的方法响应的 XML 元素名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML element namesapce used for method response to the target method.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于对目标方法的方法响应的 XML 元素命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The XML element namesapce used for method response to the target method.
trans-unit.target: 用于对目标方法的方法响应的 XML 元素命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML element name used for the return value from the target method.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于目标方法的返回值的 XML 元素名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is the "__return" string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为"__return"的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The XML element name used for the return value from the target method.
trans-unit.target: 用于目标方法的返回值的 XML 元素名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SOAPAction header field used with HTTP requests sent with this method.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此方法一起发送的 HTTP 请求使用的 SOAPAction 标头字段。

trans-unit.source: This property is currently not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 当前未实现此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is currently not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 当前未实现此属性。

trans-unit.source: The SOAPAction HTTP request header field indicates the intent of the SOAP HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: SOAPAction HTTP 请求标头字段指示 SOAP HTTP 请求的意图。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SOAPAction field, see www.w3.org/tr/soap/#_Toc478383528.
trans-unit.target: SOAPAction 字段的详细信息，请参阅 www.w3.org/tr/soap/#_Toc478383528。

trans-unit.source: The SOAPAction header field used with HTTP requests sent with this method.
trans-unit.target: 与 HTTP 请求都发送此方法使用的 SOAPAction 标头字段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the target of the current attribute will be serialized as an XML attribute instead of an XML field.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前属性的目标将序列化为 XML 特性而不是 XML 字段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute.UseAttribute%2A> property cannot be set on the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute.UseAttribute%2A>属性不能设置上<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute>属性。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute.UseAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当前实现始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the current property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置当前的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML namespace that is used during serialization of remote method calls of the target method.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在的远程方法调用的目标方法的序列化过程中使用的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace that is used during serialization of remote method calls of the target method.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化的目标方法的远程方法调用期间使用的 XML 命名空间。
